item.description:
I was wondering may be I should try something a little different than picking a movie or a restaurant and force it on everyone as a movie meetup. So I am going to post a recurring meetup occurs every third Friday and request all of you to suggest interested movie names and any fun activities that you would like to do with the rest of the group. You can provide your suggestions as a comment in your RSVP. Fun activities can be dinner, happy hour, drinks, current events, shopping, movie discussions or any other interesting activities suitable for this group at the time. I will choose the most popular suggestions for that specific week and update everyone on the exact plans closer to the actual date.

Really appreciate all of your feedback and suggestions for each month.

For the Aug-20, Friday meetup, almost all RSVP's are for the Other Guys. If anyone want to change their mind, please mark it as a comment for your RSVP: I have given the full listing below.

Bow Tie Criterion Cinemas at Blue Back Square
Showtimes for Friday, August 20, 2010


Nanny McPhee Returns (PG)
Ralph Fiennes, Maggie Gyllenhaal
100 minutes
Trailer 11:30 AM, 2:10, 4:40, 7:15, 9:35


Piranha 3D (R)
Jerry O'Connell, Ving Rhames
89 minutes
Trailer 12:00, 2:20, 4:50, 7:00, 10:00


Eat Pray Love (PG-13)
Julia Roberts, James Franco
133 minutes
Trailer 12:10, 3:45, 6:50, 9:45


The Expendables (R)
Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham
103 minutes
Trailer 11:20 AM, 1:50, 4:15, 7:10, 9:30


The Other Guys (PG-13)
Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg
107 minutes
Trailer 11:45 AM, 2:00, 4:30, 7:20, 9:40


Inception (PG-13)
Leonardo DiCaprio, Ken Watanabe
148 minutes
Trailer 11:50 AM, 3:30, 6:40, 9:50

item.how_to_find_us: I will send detailed information closer to each event.
item.name: Movies and Fun on Fridays!
